Cases of children with rare inflammatory syndrome spike in Italy and France tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738350 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/738350/cases-of-children-with-rare-inflammatory-syndrome-spike-in-italy-and-france/story/ Doctors in northern Italy, one of the areas hardest hit by the new coronavirus, and in France have reported spikes in cases of a rare inflammatory syndrome in young children that appears similar to one reported in the United States, Britain and Spain, according to a report in The Lancet. Palace: Taho, balut vendors may go back to work amid eased quarantine measures tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738344 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/738344/palace-taho-balut-vendors-may-go-back-to-work-amid-eased-quarantine-measures/story/ Street vendors such as that of taho (soy bean) and balut (fertilized chicken or duck egg) may resume work under modified quarantine measures provided that social distancing will still be observed, the Palace said Friday. Babaeng nagpumilit lumusot sa checkpoint para mag-abot lang daw ng bag, kakasuhan sa Caloocan tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738346 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/738346/babaeng-nagpumilit-lumusot-sa-checkpoint-para-mag-abot-lang-daw-ng-bag-kakasuhan-sa-caloocan/story/ Isang babae ang nakatakdang kasuhan matapos magpumilit pumasok sa isang checkpoint sa Caloocan at makipagtalo pa sa mga pulis na sumita sa kaniya, ayon sa ulat ng 24 Oras nitong Huwebes. Typhoon Ambo leaves trail of destruction in Eastern Samar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738338 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/738338/typhoon-ambo-leaves-trail-of-destruction-in-eastern-samar/story/ Typhoon Ambo unleashed its fury past noontime on Thursday, blowing off roofs of houses and knocking down branches of trees as it barreled through Eastern Samar's Santa Monica town, one of the places hit by the cyclone as it made its first landfall at 12:15 p.m. Fri, 15 May 2020 08:47:50 +0800
Coronavirus puts 4 million girls at risk of child marriage tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738336 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/738336/coronavirus-puts-4-million-girls-at-risk-of-child-marriage/story/ LONDON--Four million girls are at risk of child marriage in the next two years because of the new coronavirus pandemic, a global charity said on Friday, as campaigners warned that the crisis could undo decades of work to end the practice. US accuses Chinese-born researcher at Cleveland Clinic of ties to Chinese spying tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738333 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/738333/us-accuses-chinese-born-researcher-at-cleveland-clinic-of-ties-to-chinese-spying/story/ A Chinese-born former employee of the Cleveland Clinic was arrested on fraud charges related to $3.6 million in federal grants, the FBI said on Thursday, the latest move in a US crackdown on alleged attempts by China to steal American scientific advances. Global COVID-19 death toll breaches 300,000, total number of cases reach 4.4M tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-738332 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/738332/global-covid-19-death-toll-breaches-300-000-total-number-of-cases-reach-4-4m/story/ The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) has killed 300,140 people worldwide since it surfaced in China late last year, according to an AFP tally on Thursday based on official sources.
